content.text:
# List of churches in the Archdiocese of Newark

This is a list of churches in the in the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Newark. The archdiocese covers northeastern New Jersey in the United States. It includes the cities of Newark and Jersey City and the counties of Bergen, and Essex, Hudson, and Union. The cathedral church of the archdiocese is the Cathedral Basilica of the Sacred Heart in Newark.
